description:
Do you love candy?? We do too, so come swipe some in BLITZ THAT CANDY DASH ! ! Great candy blitzing fun. You have 60 seconds to get the highest score.

FEATURES
= GREAT MUSIC, BEAUTIFUL EYE CANDY ART WORK
= SUPER SIMPLE AND FUN GAME PLAY
= LOTS OF DIFFERENT BACKGROUNDS
= HUGE FUN FOR ADULTS AND KIDS
= FREE TO DOWNLOAD


SOME PLAYER REVIEWS
- "Cool app for killing time, I recommend it, made me a little hungry playing it though, haha" - May 2, 2013

- "i luv 2 crush my friends score on this, get dem angry, Adam ;) check out diz game, sweet c" May 3 2013


HOW TO PLAY
So so easy to play. Get the highest score possible in 1 minute.
To get score tap on the candy and arrow objects when they appear. Tap the green candy 3 times, tap the yellow candy 2 times, and tap the red candy 1 time. If an arrow appears, tap the space next to the arrow. Dont tap empty space or you will lose points.


Have fun :)
The Cobalt Play Games Team
